pkgmetadata.longdescription: Accessing the Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes // Access the 'Red List of Montane Tree Species of the Tropical Andes' Tejedor Garavito et al.(2014, ISBN:978-1-905164-60-8). This package allows users to search for globally threatened tree species within the andean montane forests, including cloud forests and seasonal (wet) forests above 1500 m a.s.l.
